pages.title: Elemental Core Regulator
pages.text: At the center of the Elemental Convergence Chamber, the Elemental Core Regulator harmonizes the raw energies of earth, water, air, and fire. Its interlocking rings and crystalline components adjust the elemental flow with precision.
